channel.title: Comments on: Making the game of thrones visualization

item.title: By: Game of ThronesInteractions Among the Top 30 Characters – PowerTrip Analytics
item.dc:creator: Game of ThronesInteractions Among the Top 30 Characters – PowerTrip Analytics
item.description: […] This data was originally compiled by Jerome Cukier and visualized beautifully on his web site using D3. You can read more about the data and how he collected on his site. […]
item.content:encoded: […] This data was originally compiled by Jerome Cukier and visualized beautifully on his web site using D3. You can read more about the data and how he collected on his site. […]

item.title: By: jerome
item.dc:creator: jerome
item.description: yes, all csv files are easily accessible from the source. The dataset is not documented though but pretty self-explanatory.
item.content:encoded: yes, all csv files are easily accessible from the source. The dataset is not documented though but pretty self-explanatory.

item.title: By: Devon Allaby
item.dc:creator: Devon Allaby
item.description: This is fantastic. Have you made your raw data set available publicly?
item.content:encoded: This is fantastic. Have you made your raw data set available publicly?
